source.name: Global Carbon Capture and Storage Projects KMZ File
source.description: The Global Carbon Capture and Storage Project Database includes both active and proposed Carbon Capture and Storage (CCS) projects world-wide. Information in the database regarding technologies being developed for capture, evaluation of sites for sequestration of carbon dioxide (CO2), estimation of project costs and anticipated dates of completion for projects are sourced from publicly available information. This database provides the public with information regarding efforts by various industries, public groups, and governments towards development and eventual deployment of CCS technology. This is an active database that will be updated as information regarding these or new projects are released to the public.
